message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's an exceptional value at $12000, considering its worth to us is significantly higher than that. This is a unique opportunity for you to secure a high-quality item at a price that reflects its true value. Let's make this deal happen!

I'm very interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you is $12000, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product. This still reflects its true value to us, while being more accessible to you. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I'm confident that we can meet in the middle and find a price that works for both of us.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product. This price aligns closely with its worth to us, while also being within your budget. I believe this could be a mutually beneficial solution.

I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9750. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us.
